sendMessages.label: Ileveli yemvume edingekayo ukuthumela umyalezo
sendMessages.tooltip: I-0 isho ukuthi wonke amalungu angathumela imiyalezo, kanti iningi lenombolo lisho ukuthi izimvume eziphakeme ziyadingeka

invite.label: Ileveli yemvume edingekayo ukumema amalungu amasha
invite.tooltip: Setha ukuthi ngubani ongamema amalungu amasha egumbini

ban.label: Izinga lemvume elidingekayo ekuvinjelweni kwamalungu
ban.tooltip: Setha ukuthi ngubani ongavimba amalungu egumbi

roomSettings.label: Shintsha izinga lemvume edingekayo yezilungiselelo zekamelo

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Imvume Yezinga lemvume: 0-100, inani elikhudlwana lisho izimvume eziphakeme ziyadingeka
